version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + show mappings for specific modulators + Lock track + a bunch more things

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + show mappings for specific modulators + Lock track + Changed mapping module + a bunch more things

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + show mappings for specific modulators + Lock track + Changed mapping module + a bunch more things

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Fixed direction width offset

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Fixed direction width offset

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + fixed mouse scrolling of values in windows (but causing a regression described below) + Added zoom to waveform + Added to use any plugin as a modulator + Re-wrote the AB Slider so it should work correctly + Fixed focus when not showing modulators in PLUGINS module + Now you can't add TILR plugins if they are not installed + some bug fixes + REGRESSION in terms of the modulators representation and color of their windows. Will need a re-write

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + fixed ADSR-1 and MSEG-1 output mapping + uptimized output plot writing. Still choppy though + removed plotting info when moving cursor over output plotter + Fix closing of Browser window, if already open for the specific track when clicking + [ANY] + Gave the Plugins module some love, with focus arrow, open fx color and button as well as options in the settings menu + improved open close function + removed option to see modulator parameters in the PARAMETERS module

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + fixed Modulator always showing output and map button + added AB mappings overview + moved "remove Modulator" button to top left corner X + fixed clean up of removing Modulator + maybe fixed parameters that are not from 0-1 for setting their baseline + fixed minimized version of modulators + added preset support + you can now hide parameters in custom modulators, this will also be stored in presets + fixed to remember pos and dock from last time

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + removed generic modulator jsfx

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Fixed collabsed mapping output

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Added Keytrack JSFX + Added Note velocity JSFX + Added Track controls Plugin (Using realearn) + changed so vertical setting is per docked area and will be remember once it's been set once + fixed issue when loading script, not catching settings properly

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + plugins menu header width fix

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + fixed show extra toggle

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + changed to move [ANY] added modulators instead of removing and inserting

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + changed how [ANY] detects closing the browser window

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + changed how [ANY] detects closing the browser window and added layover + fixed bug where ADSR would crash the script + moved settings to cogwheel + moved open plugin pos + started work on settings window + added more options for plugin view

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Better support for the addover layer for [ANY] on Windows. But does not work on docked browser + re-written way of registrering if a paremeter in an FX window was clicked. This will improve mapping and scroll + added option in settings to have focus of app follow FX window clicks. + added option in settings to app select track when focus is on a new track

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + added two options for showing track color

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + moved settings for track colors to general

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + map once works on FX windows as well now

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + added validation of tracks, to avoid error when closing session + disable LOCK if changing project

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + option to hide parameters panel

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + moved catching of fx parameters to be inside parameters panel, so not loading if not shown

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + added floating modules panel, WIP + added fix for corner case when using on default blank project (https://forum.cockos.com/showpost.php?p=2863717&postcount=185)

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + fixed cropping of open plugin/gui window when very small width is used + fixed show above not working for parameters

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + fixed issue where floating windows were not recognized for mapping

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Maybe track color fix for windows + fix crash when window is too small + fix crash no modulators container, but a manual mapping (CC) + fix right clicking modulator to show context menu

version.author: Saxmand
version.changelog: + Maybe track color fix for windows + Started color settings page work

version.changelog: + including two presets
